definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

sentences.english: Poetry prophecy is an exotic flower in remote mountains which is in full bloom in our Chinese classics hundred-flower garden.
sentences.chinese: 诗谶是盛开在中国古典文学百花园里的一株深山奇葩。

sentences.english: I also love classical literature, and Cao Xueqin is one of my favorite authors.
sentences.chinese: 我还喜欢古典文学，曹雪芹是我最喜欢的作家之一。

sentences.english: However, as soon as my parents left, I signed up Classical Literature.
sentences.chinese: 可是等父母一离开，我立刻报名学习古典文学。

sentences.english: Classical Chinese literature is difficult to understand.
Classical literature is full of adventure.
sentences.chinese: 在古典文学中充满了有关探险的故事。

sentences.english: Dickens' "A Tale of Two Cities" is a literary classic.
sentences.chinese: 狄更斯的《双城记》是一部古典文学作品。

sentences.english: She was reading for a degree of classical literature in Oxford when the war broke out.
sentences.chinese: 战争爆发时她正在牛津大学攻读古典文学学位。

sentences.english: One of my good friends is a Classics major.
sentences.chinese: 我最好的一个朋友是古典文学专业的。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about one of the stories that you've learned in your classics class?
sentences.chinese: 你能跟我们说说你在古典文学课上学到的一个故事吗？

sentences.english: He has a competent knowledge of English.
sentences.chinese: 有渊博的古典文学知识。

sentences.english: From the classical class, the classmate with glasses knows the classification.
sentences.chinese: 戴眼镜的同学从古典文学课上知道了古典名著的分类。

sentences.english: Song Lyrics is a rarity in the classical literature of China.
sentences.chinese: 宋词是我国古典文学中的一朵琦葩。

sentences.english: A professor has a fund of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 有渊博的古典文学知识。

sentences.english: Lizhi is a literature critic of the Chinese classical literature.
sentences.chinese: 李贽是中国古典文学的评点家。

sentences.english: The classic Sanskrit literature flourished on the basis of the Vedic and Epic literature.
sentences.chinese: 梵语古典文学是在吠陀和史诗的基础上发展起来的。

sentences.english: It is well known that large quantities of lyric works about tower-ascending are presented in classical literature.
sentences.chinese: 中国古典文学中存在大量登楼抒怀的作品。

definition: old language/the Classics/Classical Chinese as a literary model, esp. in Tang and Song prose/Classical Chinese as a school subject
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries

the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature, namely: A Dream of Red Mansions 紅樓夢|红楼梦[Hong2 lou2 Meng4], Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], Water Margin 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4], Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Guwen Guanzhi, an anthology of essays written in Literary Chinese, compiled and edited by Wu Chucai and Wu Diaohou of Qing dynasty
Yuan dynasty theater, including poetry, music and comedy
"Redology", academic field devoted to the study of A Dream of Red Mansions
Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
